Stanford Commencement Weekend
June 15 - 18, 2023
Congratulations class of 2023!





 

 

 




 
A Commencement Message from
President Tessier-Lavigne
To the Graduates of the Class of 2023, their parents, families and friends:
Congratulations! I am pleased to invite you to Stanford University’s 132nd Commencement Weekend. This exciting weekend is our opportunity to honor and celebrate our graduates and to thank all of their loved ones — parents, family members and friends — for their support. You will find important information about Commencement weekend on this site, including the lineup of events, important dates and deadlines for graduates and information for guests.
Commencement marks the end of one chapter and the beginning of the next. For graduates, it’s an opportunity to honor all you have achieved at Stanford and to look with excitement to your path ahead. We look forward to celebrating with you and to sharing in the traditions that make Stanford’s Commencement Weekend special.





 





 













Saturday, June 17, 2023 - 10:00 a.m.
Baccalaureate Celebration
Baccalaureate at Stanford is a multi faith celebratory gathering for graduating seniors, graduate students, and their families. The celebration will be held on Saturday, June 17 at 10:00 a.m. in Frost Amphitheater. 
Event details








 













Sunday, June 18, 2023 - 9:30 a.m.
Commencement Ceremony
Over the past 132 years, Stanford University has established a rich history of Commencement traditions. We look forward to celebrating with graduates, friends, family, faculty, and guests on Sunday, June 18 at 9:30 a.m. in Stanford Stadium.
Event details








 













Sunday, June 18, 2023
School & Department Ceremonies
Most school and department ceremonies will take place at various times and locations across campus following the main ceremony on Sunday, June 18.
Event Details







 

 
Announcements










 
Angela Buchdahl, Asian American rabbi who leads a historic synagogue, to speak at Stanford Baccalaureate
 On Saturday, June 17, Rabbi Angela Warnick Buchdahl will address Stanford graduates at the university’s Baccalaureate celebration.



 


 
April 20, 2023



AnnouncementsNews






 
Tennis legend John McEnroe will speak at Stanford’s 2023 Commencement ceremony
 On June 18, 2023, tennis legend John McEnroe will speak at the 2023 Commencement Ceremony in Stanford Stadium.



 


 
April 13, 2023
